paragraphs: That different editors will approach their tasks differently in the museum is unavoidable. Yet this is all the more reason for criteria to be applied consistently and, even more important, that they be explained and their logic made accessible to users.
The key to the catalogue entries found below outlines the selection criteria for inclusion into one of the three separate registers in the catalogue raisonn√©, and elucidates the individual.
Our completed projects represent a diverse portfolio of architectural achievements, each embodying our commitment to innovative design and sustainable practices.
Explore our ongoing projects and works in progress, where innovative architectural concepts are taking shape and transforming into reality.
We are a forward-thinking architectural practice dedicated to creating spaces that harmonize form, function, and sustainability. Our approach combines innovative design with practical solutions.
